title: Relates to the maintenance of bank codes in countywide electronic databases; appropriation
summary: Relates to the maintenance of bank codes in countywide electronic databases; requires mortgage investing institutions to send updated tax billing information to the county real property tax offices for maintenance of bank codes in countywide electronic databases; allows local assessors computerized access; appropriates five million dollars therefor.
